welcome_message_body: Welcome to Scranton, a charming city known for its rich history, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our beautiful parks, historic architecture, and delicious local cuisine. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Northern Light Espresso Bar & Cafe

restaurants.address: 536 Biden St (btwn Adams & N Washinton), Scranton, PA 18503

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wilkes-Barre/Wyoming Valley Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wilkes-Barre/Wyoming Valley Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
